modName: dragon age II 2 armour sets hawks champion armor and grey wa
descriptionHtml:
comes with 2 armor sets 

hawk\'s mage champion set : boots/chest/gloves  can be crafted at any forge doesnt take alot to make or do the command help champion 0 for the id\'s

bug: hawks champ is weird in 1st person nothing game breaking but your elbow disappears when you swing but 3rd person no bugs

grey warden armor: boots/chest/gloves/helm the best of the two in my book both look some what lore friendly too!
author: 1-_ninvus_-1
